attributes.action: Allow BTEC Students to submit all assignments at the end of the Academic Year.
attributes.additional_details:
Students have had an increase in stress whilst having to study online. These students are no less than A-Level students. Considering that the petition to allow predicted grades for BTEC was rejected, I feel like this is a more justified option and it is something that improve a student's mental health. 
BTEC students such as myself are really facing challenges with meeting deadlines and I feel like this option would be something that lifts the pressure off a student
attributes.background: I want the Government to allow BTEC Level 3 students to submit all assignments at the end of the academic year. Considering the situation with Covid-19, students like myself are struggling to submit assignments on time due to the stress and pressure that is put on us.

rejection.details:
Decisions about when to accept assignments are a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615
